about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the shoes of a famous Far West cowboy. No one is around, only wooden targets appear on both sides of the saloon. It’s up to you to shoot faster than your shadow!

Warning :this Game Is Virtual Reality Only


The Saloon is a hyper-casual game designed to introduce you to virtual reality. Explore the 3 levels and try to beat your high score !

Main Gameplay Elements


Environment & Level : closed environment represented by a saloon. 3 levels to replay infinitely in order to beat your high score !

Game physics : Some destructible environments for you to practice on.

Weapons: One or two rifles to choose from for added fun (You can play with one or two VR controllers).

Enemies : The saloon is filled with wooden targets representing your enemies, a true shooting range!

Score : The score is based on the number of targets hit as well as your shooting accuracy.
